author: Vincent Kearney
title: Belfast school joining up with hospital in virus battle
description: One of the largest and oldest schools in Northern Ireland is joining forces with the NHS to help staff in a hospital that will treat most coronavirus patients in Belfast.
content:
One of the largest and oldest schools in Northern Ireland is joining forces with the NHS to help staff in a hospital that will treat most coronavirus patients in Belfast.
St Malachy's College is a Catholic grammar school for boys that opened in 1833.
